<h2 id="h-hey-locksmiths" class="text-3xl font-header">Hey Locksmiths!</h2><p>Here‚Äôs your concise roundup of this week‚Äôs action‚Äîpacked with updates, decisions, and opportunities to get involved.</p><hr><h2 id="h-core-team-updates" class="text-3xl font-header">Core Team Updates</h2><p><a target="_blank" rel="noopener noreferrer nofollow ugc" class="dont-break-out" href="https://www.linkedin.com/in/juliengenestoux/">Julien</a> and the team did some minor fixes and improvements due to time constraints:</p><ul><li><p>Among the minor fixes and improvements were refactoring the email system and enhancing event collection features (shipping expected by week‚Äôs end).</p></li><li><p>Open Graph descriptions now support markdown correctly for event previews.</p></li><li><p>The ‚ÄúBuy UP‚Äù link on the static site now supports multiple chains, making token purchases easier for everyone, including Bitcoin users.</p></li><li><p>Sorting and filtering improvements are being considered for events and locks, with a focus on usability, and exploratory discussions are ongoing about adding guided pop-up tutorials to help new users navigate the platform.</p></li></ul><br><h2 id="h-operations-and-coordination" class="text-3xl font-header">Operations and Coordination</h2><ul><li><p><a target="_blank" rel="noopener noreferrer nofollow ugc" class="dont-break-out" href="https://www.tally.xyz/gov/unlock-protocol/proposal/4690288635831369650578024132446863170116166875528511300664433815615415133450"><strong>Last chance to vote on the Social Media Content Strategy</strong></a><br>A key vote is live on the new content creation incentive model for social channels‚Äîplease cast your vote now. For clarification, the incentive model is designed to reward both writers and video creators, with flexibility to iterate based on community feedback. All processes and models are subject to change via community vote. Experimentation is encouraged.</p></li><li><p><strong>Global Pizza Party 2025</strong><br>Working with the <a target="_blank" rel="noopener noreferrer nofollow ugc" class="dont-break-out" href="https://x.com/Pizza_DAO">PizzaDAO</a> team has been a great experience, and we have been happy to support and help. Scaling that sort of help might be a problem currently, and we should think about how we can become more effective since many Web3 newbies find their way to Unlock through the Global Pizza Party. To find the closest event to you, check out the full calendar via Unlock collections <a target="_blank" rel="noopener noreferrer nofollow ugc" class="dont-break-out" href="https://app.unlock-protocol.com/events/global-pizza-party-2025">here</a>. </p><figure float="none" data-type="figure" class="img-center" style="max-width: null;"><img src="/images/blog/unlock-dao-weekly-newsletter---may-20--2025/d12e8b571aeb251d0800ebfe5b6554cc.png" blurdataurl="data:image/png;base64," nextheight="1648" nextwidth="3152" class="image-node embed"><figcaption htmlattributes="[object Object]" class="hide-figcaption"></figcaption></figure></li></ul><br><h2 id="h-member-relations-and-governance" class="text-3xl font-header">Member Relations &amp; Governance</h2><ul><li><p><strong>Collabberry for Retroactive Funding</strong><br>Gus from <a target="_blank" rel="noopener noreferrer nofollow ugc" class="dont-break-out" href="https://collabberry.xyz/">Collabberry</a> joined us yesterday and gave us a short overview of how the tool works to distribute funding fairly. You can review the whole conversation on the Discord <a target="_blank" rel="noopener noreferrer nofollow ugc" class="dont-break-out" href="https://discord.com/channels/462280183425138719/981730617194598460">"kudos" channel</a> and watch a <a target="_blank" rel="noopener noreferrer nofollow ugc" class="dont-break-out" href="https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=Da4x7PAASRo">demo here</a>. Yonks shared a testimonial highlighting its value for team agreements and meritocracy. The tool‚Äôs roadmap includes multi-project support and automated payroll, though available resources pace development.</p></li><li><p><strong>Translation as a necessity for Unlock</strong><br>Unfortunately, a major collaboration passed us because the Unlock website is currently only available in English. We are actively seeking members who are interested in helping us change this. I would also like the DAO to consider separating funding for this specific improvement. </p><br></li></ul><h2 id="h-finances-and-resources" class="text-3xl font-header">Finances &amp; Resources</h2><ul><li><p><a target="_blank" rel="noopener noreferrer nofollow ugc" class="dont-break-out" href="https://apebond.click/UP"><strong>ApeBond x Unlock</strong></a><br>The ApeBond campaign will get another collaborative push this week! Be on the lookout and let's help by collectively sharing the campaign to get more eyes on it!</p></li><li><p><strong>GMRA PR &amp; Consulting Proposal Inconclusive</strong><br>This <a target="_blank" rel="noopener noreferrer nofollow ugc" class="dont-break-out" href="https://snapshot.box/#/s:unlock-dao.eth/proposal/0x19600ba96f2bf913943383167c5ca2b0b1207307b01b97c330c29a89796bf7b5">Snapshot </a>proposal has caused some heated discussion on our Discord server. Currently, our treasury is healthy, but caution is urged to avoid overextending on campaigns where the risks might be too high. Please make your voice heard and also suggest alternative measures!</p></li><li><p><strong>Automated Rewards with Charmverse</strong><br>DAO Members WillT and Wonderwomancode have worked on setting up an automated rewards program on our Charmverse space. <a target="_blank" rel="noopener noreferrer nofollow ugc" class="dont-break-out" href="https://charmverse.io/post/community-pricing/">Charmverse will become a paid tool via the $DEV token</a>. The DAO must consider paying for the space or providing a budget of tokens to the Steward(s) managing it.</p><br></li></ul><h2 id="h-marketing-and-communications" class="text-3xl font-header">Marketing &amp; Communications</h2><ul><li><p><strong>Ninja Promo x Unlock</strong><br>Behind the scenes, <a target="_blank" rel="noopener noreferrer nofollow ugc" class="dont-break-out" href="https://www.linkedin.com/in/cecilia-contreras-castro/">Ceci, our Steward for Marketing </a>and<a target="_blank" rel="noopener noreferrer nofollow ugc" class="dont-break-out" href="https://www.linkedin.com/in/cecilia-contreras-castro/">&nbsp;communications</a>, has worked with full dedication to set the guidelines with our project manager, Helge from Ninja Promo. As I am writing this newsletter, the last touches are being made to the social media strategy and budget distribution. Nonetheless, we have grown on social media since DAO members took over the different accounts and keep doing so. In our Charmverse space, you can <a target="_blank" rel="noopener noreferrer nofollow ugc" class="dont-break-out" href="https://app.charmverse.io/unlock-dao/social-media-analytics-7093705058685101">find a new space</a> where we keep track of monthly growth and engagement analytics.</p></li><li><p><strong>CommunityOne x Unlock</strong><br>Louisa from <a target="_blank" rel="noopener noreferrer nofollow ugc" class="dont-break-out" href="https://communityone.io/">CommunityOne</a> joined us, presenting their Discord bot, which provides AI-driven support tools to enhance potential member engagement, onboarding, and troubleshooting. Please participate in the official discussion&nbsp;<a target="_blank" rel="noopener noreferrer nofollow ugc" class="dont-break-out" href="https://discord.com/channels/462280183425138719/1374755174891131011">here</a>&nbsp;and review their <a target="_blank" rel="noopener noreferrer nofollow ugc" class="dont-break-out" href="https://communityone.gitbook.io/communityone">Gitbook</a> and <a target="_blank" rel="noopener noreferrer nofollow ugc" class="dont-break-out" href="https://docsend.com/view/hta3sx6yfei8ukga">additional documentation</a>. The tool is not open-source but provides full control over the data shared with the AI bot.</p></li><li><p><strong>Membership NFTs with Leah Sams</strong><br><a target="_blank" rel="noopener noreferrer nofollow ugc" class="dont-break-out" href="https://www.powerofwomen.io/?fbclid=PAZXh0bgNhZW0CMTEAAaec21Jr9o2JbgfE456qHq0bjF-FpYGu1SgmnccPpKoxB1JGPA4FyHN7FWp1RA_aem_1PMm8lOsQ66pTa-SB8OQyw">Leah</a> started working for the DAO a few months ago on the visuals for our membership NFTs. The process has been nothing short of magical, seeing these works of art come to life! Check the <a target="_blank" rel="noopener noreferrer nofollow ugc" class="dont-break-out" href="https://discord.com/channels/462280183425138719/1308446757599973469">dedicated channel on Discord</a> to review the process in more detail. Here is a sneak peek of some of the process and Leah's incredible digital artworks for us:</p><figure float="none" data-type="figure" class="img-center" style="max-width: null;"><img src="/images/blog/unlock-dao-weekly-newsletter---may-20--2025/34a4433904efad77be215c3a0ad23ddd.png" blurdataurl="data:image/png;base64," nextheight="1639" nextwidth="2325" class="image-node embed"><figcaption htmlattributes="[object Object]" class="hide-figcaption"></figcaption></figure><br></li></ul><h2 id="h-this-weeks-action-items" class="text-3xl font-header">This Week's Action Items</h2><p><strong>Here‚Äôs how you can get involved this week:</strong></p><ol><li><p>Vote on our active Tally (onchain) proposal(s) <a target="_blank" rel="noopener noreferrer nofollow ugc" class="dont-break-out" href="https://www.tally.xyz/gov/unlock-protocol">here</a>.</p></li><li><p>Revise or comment on the following Discord chats:<br>- <a target="_blank" rel="noopener noreferrer nofollow ugc" class="dont-break-out" href="https://discord.com/channels/462280183425138719/1275880660569161828">Tally Staking with Coolhorsegirl</a><br>- <a target="_blank" rel="noopener noreferrer nofollow ugc" class="dont-break-out" href="https://discord.com/channels/462280183425138719/1354224675890401313">GMRA PR &amp; Consulting Proposal Inconclusive</a><br>- <a target="_blank" rel="noopener noreferrer nofollow ugc" class="dont-break-out" href="https://discord.com/channels/462280183425138719/1374755174891131011">Community One x Unlock</a></p></li><li><p>Share our social media posts and engage with campaigns across <a target="_blank" rel="noopener noreferrer nofollow ugc" class="dont-break-out" href="https://x.com/UnlockProtocol">X</a>, <a target="_blank" rel="noopener noreferrer nofollow ugc" class="dont-break-out" href="https://www.linkedin.com/company/unlock-protocol-dao/">LinkedIn</a>, <a target="_blank" rel="noopener noreferrer nofollow ugc" class="dont-break-out" href="https://warpcast.com/unlock-protocol">Farcaster</a>, <a target="_blank" rel="noopener noreferrer nofollow ugc" class="dont-break-out" href="https://www.youtube.com/@UnlockProtocol">YouTube</a>, and <a target="_blank" rel="noopener noreferrer nofollow ugc" class="dont-break-out" href="https://www.tiktok.com/@unlock.dao?_t=ZT-8sqNLXE6lfn&amp;_r=1">TikTok</a>‚Äîlet‚Äôs amplify our message together!</p></li></ol><br><p>Keep the momentum going: Vote, share your feedback, and join the conversation in Discord. Every key counts as we build a fairer, more powerful protocol‚Äîtogether. If you want to be featured in future spotlights or have suggestions for the agenda, reach out by Monday evenings.</p><p>Let‚Äôs continue to innovate, support each other, and push Unlock Protocol DAO to new heights. Stay awesome, and see you in the chats and at next week‚Äôs call! <span data-name="purple_heart" class="emoji" data-type="emoji">üíú</span></p><h2 id="h-stay-unlocked" class="text-3xl font-header">Stay Unlocked!</h2><p>Your Lead Steward</p><p>Stella</p><br>
